content:
Has anyone built a system using FHIR where clinical triage is performed by presenting a user with a series of questions (one at a time), the response to the question decides the next question?

I know this can be done as one long "questionnaire" but it is the question by question approach I am looking for...
there's some ppl in Finland working on this.
I don't think it would be specifically fhir, but you can have a branching question tree which then feeds back into it?
I'm intersted in cds-hooks for this - see

People from Finland who have been working on this, feel free to contact:
Numminen Jari <jari.numminen@espoo.fi>
Ville Lindholm <ville.lindholm@duodecim.fi>
Tomi Kinnunen <Tomi.Kinnunen@duodecim.fi>
Mauno Rönkkö <mauno.ronkko@mediconsult.fi>
